Armour_sets.Name: Adventurer's Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena (both in the Depths and then under the aqueduct that leads to the Undead Burg).
Notes: Adventurer's Set cannot be upgraded.
Armor of the Glorious (chestpiece) and Gauntlets of the Vanquisher (arms) each reduce Stamina regeneration by 1 per second (2 for the total set).

Armour_sets.Name: Antiquated Set
Location: Sold by Griggs of Vinheim in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: This set is often associated with Dusk of Oolacile.

Armour_sets.Name: Artorias' Set
Location: DLC content: Found in Oolacile Township.
Notes: This set is associated with Knight Artorias the Abysswalker.

Armour_sets.Name: Balder Set
Location: Drops from Balder Knights in the Undead Parish.
Notes: The Balder Knights are known for their exceptional swordsmanship.

Armour_sets.Name: Bandit Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Bandit class.
Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Notes: The Bandit class is known for its high Strength and Dexterity stats.

Armour_sets.Name: Big Hat's Set
Location: Sold by Griggs of Vinheim in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: Worn by Big Hat Logan, the great sorcerer.

Armour_sets.Name: Black Iron Set
Location: Found in Anor Londo, near the Painted World of Ariamis annex.
Notes: This massive iron set offers high defense but is extremely heavy.

Armour_sets.Name: Black Knight Set
Location: Drops from Black Knights (various locations).
Notes: The Black Knights are powerful foes, and their set offers good fire resistance.

Armour_sets.Name: Black Set
Location: Drops from the Black Knight guarding the Darkroot Garden area.
Notes: The Black Knights are known for their greatswords and resilience.

Armour_sets.Name: Black Sorcerer Set
Location: Sold by Griggs of Vinheim in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: This set is typically worn by sorcerers with a preference for dark magic.

Armour_sets.Name: Brass Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in Anor Londo.
Notes: A rare set of brass armor, notably worn by Lady Gwynevere.

Armour_sets.Name: Catarina Set
Location: Found in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: Worn by Siegmeyer of Catarina, known for his jovial nature.

Armour_sets.Name: Chain Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Knight class.
Notes: The Chain Set provides dependable, balanced defense.

Armour_sets.Name: Channeler Set
Location: Found in the Duke's Archives.
Notes: The channelers are scholars and sorcerers working for Seath the Scaleless.

Armour_sets.Name: Chester's Set
Location: DLC content: Found in Oolacile Township.
Notes: Worn by Marvelous Chester, a time-traveling guest from the future.

Armour_sets.Name: Cleric Set
Location: Sold by Patches in Firelink Shrine after he relocates.
Notes: The cleric class is devoted to Miracles and has a high Faith stat.

Armour_sets.Name: Crimson Set
Location: Sold by Rhea of Thorolund after she relocates to the Duke's Archives.
Notes: Rhea of Thorolund is a maiden on a mission from the Church.

Armour_sets.Name: Crystalline Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Notes: This set is both rare and highly durable.

Armour_sets.Name: Dark Set
Location: Drops from the Darkwraiths in New Londo Ruins.
Notes: Darkwraiths are known as the enemies of the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.

Armour_sets.Name: Dingy Set
Location: Drops from Anastacia of Astora after she is killed.
Notes: Anastacia of Astora is the mute Fire Keeper of Firelink Shrine.

Armour_sets.Name: Eastern Set
Location: Drops from Shiva of the East in Blighttown (if you kill him).
Notes: Shiva of the East is a member of the Forest Hunter covenant.

Armour_sets.Name: Elite Knight Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Knight class.
Drops from a Mimic chest in Anor Londo.
Notes: This set is associated with the Elite Knight Oscar.

Armour_sets.Name: Favor Set
Location: Obtained from Knight Lautrec after you defeat him in Anor Londo (if he is still alive).
Notes: Knight Lautrec is a key character in the story.

Armour_sets.Name: Giant Armor Set
Location: Drops from Giant Sentinels in Anor Londo.
Notes: The Giant Sentinels are formidable foes found in Anor Londo.

Armour_sets.Name: Gold-Hemmed Black Set
Location: Drops from the Daughter of Chaos in Lost Izalith.
Notes: The Daughter of Chaos is associated with the Chaos Servant covenant.

Armour_sets.Name: Great Lord Set
Location: Drops from Gwyn, Lord of Cinder, after defeating him.
Notes: Gwyn, Lord of Cinder, is the final boss of the game.

Armour_sets.Name: Gough's Set
Location: DLC content: Found in Oolacile Township.
Notes: Associated with Hawkeye Gough, a giant in the service of Lord Gwyn.

Armour_sets.Name: Guardian Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Royal Wood (DLC content).
Notes: The Guardian Set provides high poison resistance.

Armour_sets.Name: Gwyndolin Moonlight Set
Location: DLC content: Found in Oolacile Township.
Notes: Associated with Gwyndolin, the Dark Sun and youngest child of Lord Gwyn.

Armour_sets.Name: Havel's Set
Location: Found in Anor Londo.
Notes: Havel the Rock was a powerful warrior and a bishop of his own religion.

Armour_sets.Name: Hollow Soldier Set
Location: Drops from Hollow Soldiers in various locations.
Notes: The Hollow Soldiers were once soldiers of Balder, but they became hollow.

Armour_sets.Name: Hollow Thief Set
Location: Drops from Hollow Thieves in the Lower Undead Burg.
Notes: The Hollow Thieves were once thieves, but they became hollow.

Armour_sets.Name: Hollow Warrior Set
Location: Drops from Hollow Warriors in various locations.
Notes: The Hollow Warriors were once warriors of Balder, but they became hollow.

Armour_sets.Name: Holy Set
Location: Sold by Patches in Firelink Shrine after he relocates.
Notes: This set is associated with Patches the Hyena.

Armour_sets.Name: Hunter Set
Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown (if you join the Forest Hunter covenant).
Notes: The Forest Hunter covenant is led by Alvina.

Armour_sets.Name: Iron Golem Set
Location: Drops from the Iron Golem boss in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: The Iron Golem is the boss of Sen's Fortress.

Armour_sets.Name: Iron Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Warrior class.
Notes: This set offers high physical defense but is heavy.

Armour_sets.Name: Knight Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Knight class.
Notes: This set is a classic choice for knights.

Armour_sets.Name: Lord's Blades Set
Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown (if you join the Forest Hunter covenant).
Notes: This set is associated with Shiva of the East and his bodyguard, Ninja.

Armour_sets.Name: Maiden Set
Location: Sold by Rhea of Thorolund in Firelink Shrine (after she relocates to the Duke's Archives).
Notes: This set is worn by Rhea of Thorolund, a maiden on a mission.

Armour_sets.Name: Ornstein's Set
Location: Drops from Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough boss fight in Anor Londo.
Notes: Ornstein is one of Lord Gwyn's trusted knights and a Dragonslayer.

Armour_sets.Name: Painting Guardian Set
Location: Drops from Painting Guardians in Anor Londo.
Notes: The Painting Guardians are defenders of the Painted World of Ariamis.

Armour_sets.Name: Paladin Set
Location: Drops from Reah of Thorolund and Petrus of Thorolund in Tomb of the Giants (if you kill them).
Notes: The Paladins are known for their faith and strength.

Armour_sets.Name: Pyromancer Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Pyromancer class.
Notes: This set is associated with the Pyromancer class, known for their fire spells.

Armour_sets.Name: Thorns Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Bandit class.
Notes: This set is known for causing damage to enemies on contact.

Armour_sets.Name: Shadow Set
Location: Drops from Shiva of the East in Blighttown (if you join the Forest Hunter covenant).
Notes: This set is associated with the ninja Shiva of the East.

Armour_sets.Name: Silver Knight Set
Location: Drops from Silver Knights (various locations).
Notes: The Silver Knights serve Gwyn, Lord of Cinder, and protect Anor Londo.

Armour_sets.Name: Smough's Set
Location: Drops from Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough boss fight in Anor Londo.
Notes: Smough is an executioner who enjoys his cannibalistic tendencies.

Armour_sets.Name: Sorcerer Set
Location: Sold by Griggs of Vinheim in Sen's Fortress.
Notes: This set is associated with the Sorcerer class.

Armour_sets.Name: Steel Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Notes: This set is known for its sturdy construction.

Armour_sets.Name: Stone Knight Set
Location: Drops from Stone Knights in Darkroot Garden.
Notes: The Stone Knights protect the grave of Artorias.

Armour_sets.Name: Thief Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Notes: The Thief class is known for its high Dexterity and resistance to bleeding.

Armour_sets.Name: Wanderer Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Wanderer class.
Notes: The Wanderer class is known for its balanced stats.

Armour_sets.Name: Warrior Set
Location: Starting equipment for the Warrior class.
Notes: The Warrior class is known for its high Strength and Vitality stats.

Armour_sets.Name: Witch Set
Location: Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Notes: This set is associated with the Witch Beatrice.

Armour_sets.Name: Xanthous Set
Location: Drops from Xanthous King, Jeremiah in Painted World of Ariamis.
Notes: The Xanthous Set is known for its distinct yellow color.
